resources.string:
Read our Terms & Policies. 
 Please read our Privacy Policy, for how we use and protect personal information that we receive from your phone through IRA smart devices viz., Smart Device, Smart Watch. Here are some key points: 
IRA Smart Devices lets you activate SOS on the Herdum App without you having to hold your phone and tap SOS button on the Herdum App. There are 2 options for this: 
a) Pressure Mode: quick press twice the SOS button on the IRA Smart Device b) Voice Mode: voice activate SOS by speaking your pre-recorded call-out. A call-out is a unque combination of two words of your choice. /nIRA Smart Watch, uses it’s own and the phone’s sensors, and lets you trac basic data including steps, distance, and calories burned. You can learn more here. /nWe use the information we receive to deliver our services, improve them, and research and develop new ones. In particular, we use the infrmation to personlize our services, make inferences, and show you more relevant content. /nYou can deactivate IRA Smart Device through your Herdum app’s My Profile settings. You can always delete your account at any time. /nI agree to Herdum using my information, including the information collected via IRA Smart device, in the ways described in the Privacy Policy, and summarized above. I understand that I can later withdraw this consent using My Profile settings or other tools for deleting my account.
